ws.rocket.config.bean

Class BeanContext<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ws.rocket.config.bean.BeanContext<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The bean type.

    public final class BeanContext<T>
extends Object
    Provides access to bean validation, value conversion, and bean value writing functionality for a bean type.
    Author:
    Martti Tamm

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BeanContext(Class<T> type, ValueConverter valueConverter)
      Creates a new bean context for given type.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BeanWriter<T> createWithBean(Messages messages)
      Creates a new bean and its writer instances for writing values to that new bean.
      BeanWriter<T> createWriter(Messages messages)
      Creates a new bean writer without creating a bean instance yet.
      Class<T> getBeanType()
      Provides the current bean type.
      BeanValidator getValidator()
      Provides validation functionality for the underlying bean.
      ValueConverter getValueConverter()
      Provides value conversion functionality used for the underlying bean.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BeanContext

        public BeanContext(Class<T> type,
           ValueConverter valueConverter)
        Creates a new bean context for given type. The value converter instance will be used for converting String values to runtime types used by target bean.
        Parameters:
        type - The target configuration bean type.
        valueConverter - A converter to use for bean property value conversion from String.

    • Method Detail

      • getBeanType

        public Class<T> getBeanType()
        Provides the current bean type.
        Returns:
        The bean type.

      • createWithBean

        public BeanWriter<T> createWithBean(Messages messages)
        Creates a new bean and its writer instances for writing values to that new bean.
        Parameters:
        messages - A message container to use for logging errors and warnings.
        Returns:
        The created writer.

      • createWriter

        public BeanWriter<T> createWriter(Messages messages)
        Creates a new bean writer without creating a bean instance yet. Useful, when a section writer has control over initializing the bean.
        Parameters:
        messages - A message container to use for logging errors and warnings.
        Returns:
        The created writer.

      • getValidator

        public BeanValidator getValidator()
        Provides validation functionality for the underlying bean.
        Returns:
        A validator instance.

      • getValueConverter

        public ValueConverter getValueConverter()
        Provides value conversion functionality used for the underlying bean.
        Returns:
        A value converter instance.
